original_text: For I will take you from among the heathen, and gather you out of all countries, and will bring you into your own land.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 여러 나라 가운데에서 인도하여 내고 여러 민족 가운데에서 모아 데리고 고국 땅에 들어가서

sentences.original_text: For I will take you from among the heathen
and gather you out of all countries
and will bring you into your own land
